文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: The Hanford Site N Reactor core includes approximately 1000 Zircaloy-2 pressure tubes
腐蚀数据: oxide layer thickness increases from ~3μm to over 50μm along fueled length
额外性质: {"tube_length": "16.1 m", "fueled_length": "10.6 m", "outer_surface_oxidation": "order of magnitude less than waterside", "operating_time": "25 years", "coolant_temperature_range": "204-282°C", "gas_gap_environment": "moist helium"}

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_003_chunk2
证据片段: Oxidation rates were calculated from the waterside oxide layer thickness data. The in-flux oxidation rates are clearly enhanced (at a given temperature) relative to ex-reactor Zircaloy oxidation rates and to out-of-flux rates on actual pressure tubes.
腐蚀数据: enhanced oxidation rates relative to ex-reactor
额外性质: {"oxide_layer_thickness": "<15 μm to >20 μm", "hydrogen_accumulation_rate": "follows oxidation rate", "hydrogen_distribution": "azimuthal and radial with maximum at top inner surface"}
